Credits
=======

membrane was originally created by Jarn AS (formerly known as Plone Solutions).

Contact Jarn_ for support options or sponsoring further development.

Significant refactoring, componentization, and ongoing maintenance has been
taken over by Rob Miller of `The Open Planning Project`_ (robm -at- openplans
<dot> org).

.. _Jarn: http://www.jarn.com/
.. _The Open Planning Projects: http://www.openplans.org/
